text: In Greek mythology, Eriboea (Ancient Greek: Ἐρίβοια) , also Eeriboea (Ἠερίβοια) were the name of the following figures: * Eriboea, alternate name for Periboea, wife of Telamon. * Eriboea, one of the Amazons. * Eriboea, second wife of Aloeus. Category:Amazons (Greek mythology)
title: Eriboea (mythology)
